item.title: Publish your blog made with Hugo on GitHub Pages
item.description: So now you decided to publish your recently created blog on GitHub Pages. Well, this tutorial will help you do it, maybe not in the best way, as I am also a beginner, but it certainly works! Create your GitHub Pages repository There is not much to say about it, you will just create a new repository on your GitHub account. The important thing is that this repository needs a special name, that is:

item.title: Using Hugo
item.description: I decided to start logging some of my learnings in a site. So I remembered of a tool called Hugo that may help me to do it. Hugo is a popular static site generator written in Go. In this post, I will walk you through the process of installing Hugo, configuring and publishing your first post. Nothing better than start my tech journal with a post on how to use the tool that I’ll use to write my tech journal.
